tier1.title: Your Human is Sick
tier1.shortDescription: Your Human is Sick is an adventure game where you are a naive T-cell fighting through an infection through puzzles and combat!
bulletPoints: Acted as Creative Director for the game, supervising all designers, programmers and artists
Designed and implemented functionality for the UI with Blueprints
Created a Save System in C++ and Blueprints
Designed, pitched and created GDD for the game

tier1.title: Twin-Stick Shooter
tier1.shortDescription: Currently working on a multiplayer twin-stick shooter
bulletPoints: Created and replicated ability component in C++
Created abilities in C++ that can be implemented in Blueprints
Empowered designers to create content by a data-driven spawning system in C++ with data tables
Prototyped multiplayer proof of concept along other programmers in the team

tier1.title: Defensees
tier1.shortDescription: A weird mix of turn based and tower defense, with big inspirations from roguelikes
bulletPoints: Designed and developed a turn-based system in C#
Designed and developed a wave progression system
Created and integrated a variety of enemies
Added extensive polish to the game, such as particle effects, sound effects and screen shake

tier1.title: Bopping Blobs
tier1.shortDescription: King of the Hill style game where you are always fighting to be the true king.
bulletPoints: Created gameplay (character movement and attack)
Created AI behavior for enemies
Create simple behavior tree framework for Unity
Added and integrated polish, such as particle, sound and decals

tier2.title: Upside Down
tier2.shortDescription: Had a short internship at GILP Studio, where I worked updating and adding futures to an already existing game.
bulletPoints: Updated engine version, google play services, Firebase and AdMob
Added polish to the user interface and improved music transition on FMOD
Started working on iOS port

tier2.title: Fourth Dimension
tier2.shortDescription: Developed and released two mobile games
bulletPoints: Created game studio website and identity
Created and released a casual game
Created and released an idle game

tier2.title: 2D Platformers
tier2.shortDescription: Developed 4 different 2D platformers, 3 for GameJams, and iterated upon previous code.
bulletPoints: Created 2D character controller using raycasts in C#
Created walljump and dash variations
Iterated and improved from previous projects

tier2.title: GameMaker: Studio 2
tier2.shortDescription: Developed two games in GameMaker: Studio 2 for the GameMaker Community Jam 7 and for the Heartjam in 2018.
bulletPoints: Made procedural dungeon generation in GML
Top-down melee combat system
Top-down shooter
